channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar Network Packet Capture Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar Network Packet Capture Software

item.title: CVE-2019-4576|2024-08-04T19:40:47.527Z -- ibm -- qradar%20network%20packet%20capture%20software
item.description: IBM QRadar Network Packet Capture 7.3.0 - 7.3.3 Patch 1 and 7.4.0 GA does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 166803.
